name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
description:
The number of volumes that are allowed to
  fail before a datanode stops offering service. By default
  any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown.
  The value should be greater than or equal to -1 , -1 represents minimum
  1 valid volume.

name: httpfs.buffer.size
description: The size buffer to be used when creating or opening httpfs filesystem IO stream.

name: dfs.namenode.replication.max-streams
description: Hard limit for the number of replication streams other than those with highest-priority.

name: dfs.content-summary.sleep-microsec
description:
The length of time in microseconds to put the thread to sleep, between reaquiring the locks
    in content summary computation.

name: hadoop.zk.num-retries
description: Number of tries to connect to ZooKeeper.
